summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline for the PixArt Alpha model, orchestrating text tokenization, image preprocessing, latent diffusion steps, and VAE decoding to generate images from textual prompts. Includes utilities for handling aspect ratios, scheduler configuration, and optional safety checking.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation into applications, offering a high‑quality, configurable image synthesis service powered by the PixArt Alpha diffusion architecture.
